Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

How many notifications are included in my account?

![Image 545](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c51758c58939b30a6fd3d73/61dd52744e2fead5475319e0_Path.svg)

Below are the notification limits for different plans:  
  
**Free:** 100 (sms+voice combined)  
  
**Pro:** You’ll be charged based as below:  
**For US, India and Brazil:** # of users x 100 free notifications; SMS & Voice combined). Additional notifications can be availed at $0.1 per additional SMS or call  
**For rest of the world:** (# of users x 25 free notifications). Additional notifications can be availed at $0.35 per additional SMS or call.  
  
**Premium:** Unlimited  
  
**Enterprise:** Unlimited

Do you support international SMS and voice notifications?

![Image 546](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c51758c58939b30a6fd3d73/61dd52744e2fead5475319e0_Path.svg)

Yes, we support international SMS and voice notifications.

Is your platform compliant with industry-standard security regulations?

![Image 547](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c51758c58939b30a6fd3d73/61dd52744e2fead5475319e0_Path.svg)

Yes, we are GDPR, SOC 2 Type II compliant and ISO 27001 certified. You can [click here](https://www.squadcast.com/security) to view our Security policy.

Do you give discounts to non-profits?

![Image 548](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c51758c58939b30a6fd3d73/61dd52744e2fead5475319e0_Path.svg)

Yes! Feel free to reach out to [support@squadcast.com](mailto:support@squadcast.com) and we'll be happy to give your organization a discount.

How can I subscribe and where can I see my invoices?

![Image 549: arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c51758c58939b30a6fd3d73/620f2fdbe7e5cb2cb0d050ec_whitePath.svg)

The account owner will be able to login to the Billing portal (Settings \> Billing \> Billing Portal). You can view your invoices there.

What are my payment options?

![Image 550](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c51758c58939b30a6fd3d73/61dd52744e2fead5475319e0_Path.svg)

We accept Credit card payment for Monthly and Annual invoices. You can also make payments via Bank transfer for Annual invoices only.

What will be the charge for stakeholders?

![Image 551](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c51758c58939b30a6fd3d73/61dd52744e2fead5475319e0_Path.svg)

Squadcast supports stakeholder licenses only on the Premium Plan and Enterprise Plans. With the Premium plan, you can add up to 10 stakeholders at no extra charge, while our Enterprise plan allows for an unlimited number of stakeholders, also at no additional cost.

What will happen after I exhaust the free notifications?

![Image 552](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c51758c58939b30a6fd3d73/61dd52744e2fead5475319e0_Path.svg)

**Free:** In the Free Plan, only the first 100 notifications (SMS + Phone calls) are free. This is a one-time offering for the whole account. Once you exhaust this limit, you can receive only Email and Mobile Push notifications.  
  
**Pro:** You’ll be charged based as below:  
**For US, India and Brazil:** # of users x 100 free notifications; SMS & Voice combined). Additional notifications can be availed at $0.1 per additional SMS or call  
**For rest of the world:** (# of users x 25 free notifications). Additional notifications can be availed at $0.35 per additional SMS or call.  
  
**Premium:** Unlimited notifications  
  
**Enterprise:** Unlimited notifications

How does the 14-day trial work?

![Image 553](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c51758c58939b30a6fd3d73/61dd52744e2fead5475319e0_Path.svg)

You will have access to all of Squadcast’s features for 14 days on the Trial Plan. Notification limit: 100 (Phone + SMS combined)

Do you offer onboarding and training?

![Image 554](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c51758c58939b30a6fd3d73/61dd52744e2fead5475319e0_Path.svg)

Yes, we do. We’ll be happy to customize the onboarding and training plan based on your use case. Please write to [support@squadcast.com](mailto:support@squadcast.com).

Can I upgrade or downgrade any time?

![Image 555](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c51758c58939b30a6fd3d73/61dd52744e2fead5475319e0_Path.svg)

Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade anytime and you’d be charged on a pro-rata basis.

How can I subscribe and where can I see my invoices?

![Image 556: arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c51758c58939b30a6fd3d73/620f2fdbe7e5cb2cb0d050ec_whitePath.svg)

The account owner will be able to login to the Billing portal (Settings \> Billing \> Billing Portal). You can view your invoices there.

What are the different user types?

![Image 557](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c51758c58939b30a6fd3d73/61dd52744e2fead5475319e0_Path.svg)

**Account owner:** Squadcast allows only one Account Owner per Organization. An Account Owner has all the privileges in that Organization and by default will also be responsible for the billing of the account.  
  
**User:** Users, by default, have the ability to customize their Profile, Notification rules, Respond to, and resolve incidents. Typically, Users are the Engineers, SREs, Systems Engineers or anyone in your team that handles incident management & on-call.  
  
**Stakeholders:** Stakeholders have **view-only access** to all incidents. This means that Stakeholders are **not notified by default** for any of the incidents created in Squadcast.

What if I don’t see an integration I need?

![Image 558](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c51758c58939b30a6fd3d73/61dd52744e2fead5475319e0_Path.svg)

We integrate with [100+ tools](https://www.squadcast.com/integrations) and are constantly adding more. You could alternatively use our Public API to integrate with the tool of your choice. However, we are always looking for new integrations. You could [reach out to us](mailto:support@squadcast.com) with your needs and we can have this delivered.
